name: NextScent
0:
”Alexa, turn on the air freshner”
”Alexa, set intensity to 10 on the air freshener”
”Alexa, turn on my NextScent air freshner”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
TOTAL CONTROL

The NextScent App gives you total control for your NextScent devices used in your home and/or for your business locations – anywhere in the world.Monitor and manage any authorized and connected deviceSet multiple schedules and events with desired intensity settingsCheck device status, fragrance levels and indoor air quality (AQS enabled devices) Set alert notifications for cartridge changes, air quality, system setting changes, etc.HVAC compatible systems provide HVAC system fan status

SECURE

We take your network security seriously. Our cloud based system utilizes multi-layered security provided by the Microsoft Azure data centers. If your WiFi is not secure or not available for your NextScent device, no problem. You can control your NextScent device via a secured Bluetooth connection with this App. 

EASY

Set up is easy. If you are business user, most of the setup will be completed for you.The Home screen provides instant access to your local devices. The Order button makes it easy to order replacement cartridges and to check on existing orders. Need help? Tap the Support button. It’s that easy.
